Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.controller

Class ShortcutController

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.controller.ShortcutController
public class ShortcutController extends Object
Creates listeners and attaches them to a scene. Implements shortcuts into the scene and their actions when triggered

    • setupShortcuts

      public static void setupShortcuts(javafx.scene.Scene scene, com.calendarfx.model.CalendarSource mainCalendarSource, AtomicBoolean isWeeklyView, javafx.scene.text.Text dailyText, javafx.scene.text.Text weeklyText, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane switchViewButton, javafx.scene.layout.VBox leftPanel, com.calendarfx.view.DetailedDayView calendarDayView, com.calendarfx.view.DetailedWeekView calendarWeekView, javafx.scene.layout.VBox dailygoals)
      Creates listeners to handle key press events and attaches them to the scene.
      Parameters:
      scene - Current scene contained in Stage of javaFx
      mainCalendarSource - Object containing all calendars
      isWeeklyView - indicates what view is being shown on calendar.
      dailyText - Text that swaps between daily and weekly views
      calendarDayView - The view component for displaying daily calendar
      calendarWeekView - The view component for displaying weekly calendar
      leftPanel - The left panel in the UI layout
      switchViewButton - Button that toggles the view between daily and weekly
      weeklyText - Text that swaps between daily and weekly views

    • changeViewToggle

      private static void changeViewToggle(AtomicBoolean isWeeklyView, javafx.scene.text.Text dailyText, javafx.scene.text.Text weeklyText, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane switchViewButton, javafx.scene.layout.VBox leftPanel, com.calendarfx.view.DetailedDayView calendarDayView, com.calendarfx.view.DetailedWeekView calendarWeekView)
      Toggles the view between daily and weekly views in the calendar.
      Parameters:
      isWeeklyView - Indicates if the current view is weekly
      dailyText - Text element for the daily view
      weeklyText - Text element for the weekly view
      switchViewButton - Button to switch the view
      leftPanel - The left panel in the UI layout
      calendarDayView - The view component for displaying daily calendar
      calendarWeekView - The view component for displaying weekly calendar
